groundZero.name: groundZero
groundZero.description:
The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.
Gather as much lead and copper as possible.
Move on.

saltFlats.name: saltFlats
saltFlats.description:
On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.

The enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.

frozenForest.name: frozenForest
frozenForest.description:
Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.

Begin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.

biomassFacility.name: biomassFacility
biomassFacility.description:
The origin of spores. This is the facility in which they were researched and initially produced.
Research the technology contained within. Cultivate spores for the production of fuel and plastics.

[lightgray]Upon this facility's demise, the spores were released. Nothing in the local ecosystem could compete with such an invasive organism.

craters.name: craters
craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.

ruinousShores.name: ruinousShores
ruinousShores.description:
Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.
Continue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.

windsweptIslands.name: windsweptIslands
windsweptIslands.description:
Further past the shoreline is this remote chain of islands. Records show they once had [accent]Plastanium[]-producing structures.

Fend off the enemy's naval units. Establish a base on the islands. Research these factories.

stainedMountains.name: stainedMountains
stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.

extractionOutpost.name: extractionOutpost
extractionOutpost.description:
A remote outpost, constructed by the enemy for the purpose of launching resources to other sectors.

Cross-sector transport technology is essential for further conquest. Destroy the base. Research their Launch Pads.

fungalPass.name: fungalPass
fungalPass.description:
A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.
Destroy it.
Use Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

overgrowth.name: overgrowth
overgrowth.description:
This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.
The enemy has established an outpost here. Build Mace units. Destroy it.

tarFields.name: tarFields
tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.

impact0078.name: impact0078
impact0078.description:
Here lie remnants of the interstellar transport vessel that first entered this system.

Salvage as much as possible from the wreckage. Research any intact technology.

desolateRift.name: desolateRift
desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.

nuclearComplex.name: nuclearComplex
nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.

planetaryTerminal.name: planetaryTerminal
planetaryTerminal.description:
The final target.

This coastal base contains a structure capable of launching Cores to local planets. It is extremely well guarded.

Produce naval units. Eliminate the enemy as quickly as possible. Research the launch structure.
